scripts.compdb:darwin: smake build --compdb arch_darwin_arm64 homedir_darwin_arm64 network_interfaces_darwin_arm64 tmpdir_darwin_arm64
scripts.compdb:linux: smake build --compdb arch_linux_arm64 homedir_linux_arm64 network_interfaces_linux_arm64 tmpdir_linux_arm64
scripts.compdb:win32: smake build --compdb arch_win32_x86_64 homedir_win32_x86_64 network_interfaces_win32_x86_64 tmpdir_win32_x86_64
